nodes.text: The Osskorn system was a star system located in the Tyan sector, a part of the galactic regions known as the Mid Rim and the New Territories. A hyperlane connected the system to the worlds Tyan and Kwannot, and it fell within the borders of the New Republic in 12 ABY. The system was the origin point of the Osskorn Stout beverage.
The Osskorn system was first mentioned in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, written by Jason Fry and Daniel Wallace, which placed the system in grid square L-6.
